newsitem.title: UK: John Lewis weekly UK store sales up 21.0% yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: John Lewis weekly UK store sales up 21.0% yr/yr.

text.p: British retailing group John Lewis Partnership said on Friday that sales in its UK department stores were up 21.0 percent year-on-year in the week ending August 17.
Total store sales over the week, including food sales from the Waitrose supermarket chain, rose 13.7 percent from a year earlier.
For the three weeks to August 17, department store sales were up 21.4 percent year-on-year while total sales rose 13.7 percent.
